name: Spirit Guardians
descricao:
You call forth spirits to protect you. They flit around you to a distance of 15 feet for the duration. If you are good or neutral [espiritual], their spectral form appears angelic or fey (your choice). If you are evil [necromancia], they appear fiendish.
	When you cast this spell, you can designate any number of creatures you can see to be unaffected by it. An affected creature’s speed is halved in the area, and when the creature enters the area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there, it must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 3d8 elemental damage. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage.
	**Enhance Spell**. For each extra 1000 mana spent on this spell, add 1d8 to the damage, up to 3d8 additional damage.
